principles.accountabilityLong: DIRECTGOLD stands for a clear separation of responsibilities between two specialised companies: Goldato Handels GmbH, which handles trading exclusively, and GOLDLAGERHAUS Edelmetallverwahrungs AG, which is solely responsible for the secure storage of customer gold. This structure ensures maximum transparency and security for gold purchases, sales and the secure vaulting of your gold.
principles.accountabilityFullContent: DIRECTGOLD stands for a clear separation of responsibilities between two specialised companies: Goldato Handels GmbH, which handles trading exclusively, and GOLDLAGERHAUS Edelmetallverwahrungs AG, which is solely responsible for the secure storage of customer gold. This structure ensures maximum transparency and security for gold purchases, sales and the secure vaulting of your gold. The contractual relationship with the customer forms a clear triangular relationship between buyer, dealer and custodian – with the following advantages:
principles.validationShort: Your identity. Your account. Digitally verified.
principles.validationLong: Before your personal customer account is opened and activated at DIRECTGOLD, it undergoes a structured validation process. This process clearly confirms your identity and verifies your account – a key step in ensuring that only you have access to your gold deposit and that all transactions are legally secure.
principles.validationFullContent: Before your personal customer account is opened and activated at DIRECTGOLD, it undergoes a structured validation process. This process clearly confirms your identity and verifies your account – a key step in ensuring that only you have access to your gold deposit and that all transactions are legally secure. When you buy gold from DIRECTGOLD, you are acquiring genuine ownership of physical gold – and you can be sure that everything is absolutely secure, transparent and legally binding. That's why everything starts with an onboarding process that meets the highest standards – as you would expect from advanced online banks – only slightly faster and more convenient than at most banks – and completed fully automatically within a few minutes. We use state-of-the-art technology to make the process reliable, secure and straightforward for you.
principles.transparencyShort: Buy and sell at the LBMA gold price
principles.transparencyLong: The transparent DIRECTGOLD pricing is based directly on the LBMA gold price. For each transaction, we show you the LBMA gold price (including rate and date) on which your purchase is based, as well as the exact purchase or sales fee charged.
principles.transparencyFullContent: The transparent DIRECTGOLD pricing is based directly on the LBMA gold price.
principles.ownershipShort: Direct ownership of clearly allocated gold bars
principles.ownershipLong: DIRECTGOLD exclusively stores allocated, verifiably physically existing gold bars that are directly assigned to you. Direct ownership, which you can independently verify 24/7, including the bar number for each individual bar.
principles.ownershipFullContent: DIRECTGOLD exclusively stores allocated, verifiably physically existing gold bars that are directly assigned to you. Direct ownership, which you can independently verify 24/7, including the bar number for each individual bar. You acquire proportional ownership of a collectively stored quantity of registered gold bars between 100 g and 1 kg. This allows you to make smaller or regular purchases without having to decide on specific bar sizes for each purchase or buy expensive micro bars. The bar sizes of 100 g and larger selected by DIRECTGOLD for collective storage offer you optimal conditions, transparency and full legal certainty. As soon as you own at least 100 g, you can register an entire gold bar in your name at any time and have it transferred to you in undivided individual storage exclusively in your name – always including the specific number of your bar, which you can check directly at any time.
principles.originShort: Newly produced bars, directly from the refinery to the high-security vault
principles.originLong: At DIRECTGOLD, you only buy NEWLY PRODUCED GOLD BARS, not used goods from the secondary market. The bars produced come directly from LBMA-certified refineries, usually from Argor-Heraeus. Complete documentation from casting to storage – no previous owners, signs of wear or unclear supply chains.
principles.originFullContent: At DIRECTGOLD, you only buy NEWLY PRODUCED GOLD BARS, not used goods from the secondary market.
principles.integrityShort: Guaranteed authenticity and tamper-proof traceability using blockchain technology
principles.integrityLong: Every single bar stored by DIRECTGOLD for its customers has a "digital twin" – a forgery-proof, standardised digital representation of the physical gold bar enriched with all relevant data on the aXedras platform.
principles.integrityFullContent: Every single bar stored by DIRECTGOLD for its customers has a "digital twin" – a forgery-proof, standardised digital representation of the physical gold bar enriched with all relevant data on the aXedras platform ("Bullion Integrity Ledger™").
principles.accountabilitySection1Title: Clear point in time of transfer of ownership
principles.accountabilitySection1Content: The purchase contract is concluded between you and Goldato. As soon as the purchased amount of gold is booked into your personal gold deposit at Goldlagerhaus, the purchase contract is deemed to have been fulfilled, and ownership of the gold has been legally transferred to you.
principles.accountabilitySection2Title: Clear separation of trading and storage
principles.accountabilitySection2Content: This means that any risks arising from Goldato's trading activities are strictly separated from the holdings stored at Goldlagerhaus.
principles.accountabilitySection2Item1: Goldato: trading only, no storage of customer gold
principles.accountabilitySection3Title: Transparent processing of purchases and sales
principles.accountabilitySection3Item1: You buy your gold from and sell it to Goldato.
principles.accountabilitySection3Item2: Purchases and sales are made at the next possible LBMA gold price PM (order execution).
principles.accountabilitySection3Item3: The purchase contract is settled by transferring the purchased amount of gold to your gold deposit account held with GOLDLAGERHAUS AG.
principles.accountabilitySection4Content: The DIRECTGOLD platform is operated jointly by both companies. Both accounts are displayed in parallel on the platform, clearly separated and at the same time shown in total. This allows you to see at any time which company your assets are held with. Gold quantities and monetary amounts that are currently being processed as part of your trading orders are shown in the trading account, while the gold deposit shows the gold that you own from purchase contracts that have already been fulfilled.
principles.accountabilitySection4Item2: Goldlagerhaus manages your custody account (gold deposit).
principles.validationSection1Item1: Your identification using your official photo ID and the signing of the necessary documents with a qualified electronic signature (QES) – eIDAS-compliant and therefore legally equivalent to your handwritten signature, so that we can offer you our services with the highest level of legal certainty
principles.validationSection1Item2: Automatic verification of your personal details such as name, date of birth, nationality, telephone number and email address to prevent errors in data entry
principles.validationSection1Item3: Digital comparison with international PEP and sanctions lists to ensure that all regulatory requirements are met
principles.validationSection1Item4: Pay for your first purchase using direct bank-to-bank payment via Tink – our European open banking partner for instant, secure and fee-free payments directly from your account. You can easily make the payment via your own bank's app or online banking service – just as you are used to. Tink, part of the Visa Group, is Europe's leading account-to-account payment provider and stands for maximum security and reliability.
principles.validationSection1Item5: All verification steps run seamlessly in the background – digitally, without paper, without waiting times, without manual intervention.
principles.validationSection1Item6: And best of all, you only have to go through the DIRECTGOLD onboarding process once – in just a few minutes – and at the same time open your accounts with both companies: with GOLDATO Handels GmbH for trading and with GOLDLAGERHAUS AG for the secure storage of your gold.
principles.validationSection2Title: Why go to all this trouble?
principles.validationSection2Content: Quite simply because it's about your property and your security. This protects not only us, but also you – because you can be sure that you are working with a reputable, audited and compliant partner. Fully automated account validation with maximum security and maximum convenience.
principles.transparencySection1Item1: The transparent DIRECTGOLD pricing is based directly on the LBMA gold price.
principles.transparencySection1Item2: We pass this on to you 1:1 for both purchases (plus purchase fee) and sales (minus sales fee).
principles.transparencySection2Item1: For each transaction, we show you the LBMA gold price (including rate and date) on which your purchase is based, as well as the exact purchase or sales fee charged.
principles.transparencySection3Title: What are the advantages for you?
principles.transparencySection3Item1: The LBMA gold price is a globally transparent reference price.
principles.transparencySection3Item2: It represents a market-driven average price and is therefore more economically advantageous than individual dealer prices at any given time of day.
principles.transparencySection3Item3: The model protects you from: non-transparent or incomprehensible mark-ups/mark-downs, unfavourable intraday transaction times.
principles.transparencySection4Title: Degressive scaling of the purchase fee
principles.transparencySection4Item1: Unlike other providers, who view each gold purchase made by their customers in isolation, the purchase fee charged by DIRECTGOLD is based on the total amount of gold you have purchased over the last 12 months. The purchase fee is degressive, depending on the purchase volume processed in the last 12 months. This allows you to make individual purchases over time at a lower cost than if each purchase were considered and billed separately.
principles.transparencySection4Item2: If, instead of buying gold just once, you want to invest several times and possibly also in smaller amounts, you benefit from the cumulative consideration of your purchases made in the last 12 months.
principles.transparencySection4Item3: The purchase fee decreases gradually as the total investment amount increases.
principles.transparencySection5Title: Additional discount for gold purchase plans
principles.transparencySection5Item1: We provide you with special support in building up your personal gold reserve over the long term as part of your gold purchase plan: Not only through the degressive scaling of the purchase fee based on the last 12 months, but also by adding the volume of gold purchases you have planned but not yet made for the next 12 months according to your gold purchase plan. Basis for purchase fee = actual purchases in the last 12 months + purchases planned for the next 12 months
principles.transparencySection5Item2: No initial payment, closing fee or similar – only the monthly purchase amounts you have chosen, no purchase obligation, no disadvantages if you do not make your planned monthly purchases or if you cancel the gold purchase plan altogether.
principles.originSection1Item1: The bars produced come directly from LBMA-certified refineries, usually from Argor-Heraeus.
principles.originSection1Item2: Complete documentation from casting to storage – no previous owners, signs of wear or unclear supply chains.
principles.originSection1Item3: There is no risk of counterfeiting or uncertainty, which can occur on the secondary market.
principles.originSection1Item4: After production, each bar is transported directly from the refinery to the high-security vault of Goldlagerhaus AG at LOOMIS in Zurich/Kloten (Switzerland), with no detours or transfers.
principles.originSection1Item5: New bars are provided with the latest security standards (serial numbers, laser engravings, certificates).
principles.originSection1Item6: Through integration into the aXedras platform, each bar receives a digital twin. This documents its origin, authenticity, supply chain integrity and current storage location – transparently, forgery-proof and accessible to you at any time.
principles.originLink3: Excursus 4 – Switzerland as a storage location
principles.integritySection1Title: The digital twin contains a wealth of information, including:
principles.integritySection1Item1: Serial number and bar size (100 g, 500 g, 1 kg, etc.)
principles.integritySection1Item3: Origin of the raw material (mines, recycling as proof of "responsible sourcing")
principles.integritySection1Item5: Ownership status and location (e.g. held in custody by a specific custodian, such as GOLDLAGERHAUS AG, and custody location, such as LOOMIS CH)
principles.integritySection2Item1: The digital twin is stored using distributed ledger technology.
principles.integritySection2Item2: Every change (e.g. change of ownership, relocation, audit update) is recorded as a transaction.
principles.integritySection2Item3: The digital twin "grows with the bar". This creates an unalterable audit trail (digital history).
principles.integritySection2Item4: The twin can be used to trace the bar at any time: where does it come from, where is it now, and who does it belong to?
principles.deliveryLong: With DIRECT Delivery, you have full control over when and where your physical gold is delivered. You can have your gold delivered to your desired delivery address at any time via our transaction platform – simply, transparently and securely.
principles.deliveryFullContent: With DIRECT Delivery, you have full control over when and where your physical gold is delivered. You can have your gold delivered to your desired delivery address at any time via our transaction platform – simply, transparently and securely. If your gold is held in collective custody by GOLDLAGERHAUS Edelmetallverwahrungs AG, you decide for yourself in which bar sizes you would like to receive your delivery – from 1 g, 2 g, 5 g, 10 g, 20 g, 1 ounce, 50 g, 100 g, 250 g, 500 g up to 1 kg. When you place your online delivery order, you simultaneously instruct GOLDLAGERHAUS AG to transfer the amount of gold required for your desired delivery to GOLDATO Handels GmbH, and GOLDATO Handels GmbH to physically deliver the bar sizes you have selected to your delivery address. The only costs incurred for physical delivery are the denomination surcharges (bar premiums) corresponding to the selected bar sizes and the delivery costs depending on the delivery value and destination. Both cost components can be viewed at any time in our fee table and will be displayed transparently and accurately when you create your online delivery order before you place your order. Only bars of the highest quality, manufactured by LBMA-certified refineries, tested and recognised worldwide, are delivered. If, on the other hand, you have not stored your gold bars in collective storage, but exclusively in your name in individual storage at GOLDLAGERHAUS AG, you also have the option – in addition to the delivery process as with collective storage – of having your specific bars shipped directly from individual storage to your delivery address. In this case, you instruct GOLDLAGERHAUS AG via our transaction platform – specifying the specific bar number stamped on the bars – to deliver them from the LOOMIS high-security warehouse in Zurich/Kloten. All deliveries are, of course, carried out by first-class logistics partners and are fully insured. DIRECT Delivery stands for the consistent combination of digital efficiency and physical security.

exkurs.exkursArgorHeraeusParagraph2: LBMA & Good Delivery: LBMA-accredited "Good Delivery" refinery for decades, meets the highest standards in bar production.
exkurs.exkursArgorHeraeusParagraph3: Specialisation in precious metal processing: Focus on refining, recycling, processing and production of gold, silver, platinum and palladium. Wide range of LBMA-certified investment bars (1g to 400 ounce Good Delivery bars), recognised and tradable worldwide.
exkurs.exkursArgorHeraeusParagraph4: Sustainability & transparency: Argor-Heraeus is considered a pioneer in responsible sourcing and traceability of precious metals.
exkurs.exkursArgorHeraeusParagraph5: Customer base: Customers include banks, financial institutions, jewellery and watch manufacturers, industrial companies, government institutions and central banks.
exkurs.exkursArgorHeraeusParagraph6: aXedras membership: Argor-Heraeus is a member of the aXedras network and supports the digital traceability, authentication and anti-counterfeiting of precious metal bars.
exkurs.exkursArgorHeraeusParagraph7: Argor-Heraeus stands for quality, LBMA standards, global recognition, sustainability and digital transparency.
exkurs.exkursArgorHeraeusParagraph8: Relevance for DIRECTGOLD: Argor-Heraeus bars guarantee the highest standards of quality and origin as well as the international tradability of the bars.
exkurs.exkursLoomisTitle: Excursus 3 – Gold bar storage at LOOMIS
exkurs.exkursLoomisParagraph1: Size & presence: Loomis is a leading global cash logistics company with approximately 24,500 employees and annual sales of over SEK 30 billion, listed on the Nasdaq Stockholm.
exkurs.exkursLoomisParagraph2: LBMA membership: Loomis International (UK) Ltd is an LBMA transporter member and part of the official LBMA infrastructure.
exkurs.exkursLoomisParagraph3: Precious metal logistics & storage: Specialises in secure transport, customs clearance, vaulting and inventory management of precious metals; operates high-security vaults in major financial centres such as Zurich, London, Hong Kong and New York.
exkurs.exkursLoomisParagraph4: Customer base & trust: Loomis enjoys the trust of leading market participants, including international banks, financial service providers and central banks.
exkurs.exkursLoomisParagraph5: Insurance coverage: Assets stored with Loomis are fully insured.
exkurs.exkursLoomisParagraph6: aXedras membership: Loomis is part of the aXedras network and supports the digital traceability, authenticity and integrity of precious metals.
exkurs.exkursLoomisParagraph7: Relevance for DIRECTGOLD: GOLDLAGERHAUS AG stores its customers' gold bars at LOOMIS in Switzerland (Zurich/Kloten). LOOMIS brings the decisive combination of global reach, LBMA recognition, the highest security and insurance standards, and modern technology integration to its partnership with Goldlagerhaus.
exkurs.exkursSchweizLagerstandortTitle: Excursus 4 – Switzerland as a storage location for gold
exkurs.exkursSchweizLagerstandortParagraph1: No expropriations ever: Switzerland is the only major Western country that has never restricted or expropriated private gold ownership – neither in times of war nor in times of crisis. In all other leading Western economies (e.g. the US, UK, France, Germany), there were instances of government intervention or bans in the 20th century, some of which lasted for decades.
exkurs.exkursSchweizLagerstandortParagraph2: Politically and legally stable: A neutral, stable democracy for over 200 years with strong property protection and a high degree of legal certainty.
exkurs.exkursSchweizLagerstandortParagraph3: Global centre for gold: More than 60% of the world's gold is refined and stored in Switzerland. International partners such as Argor-Heraeus and Loomis guarantee the highest quality and security standards.
exkurs.exkursSchweizLagerstandortParagraph4: Data protection & discretion: Strict Swiss data protection laws and storage outside the banking system ensure privacy and asset protection.
exkurs.exkursSchweizLagerstandortParagraph5: Tax advantages: No VAT or capital gains tax on investment gold, no reporting requirements for pure storage.
exkurs.exkursSchweizLagerstandortParagraph6: Relevance for DIRECTGOLD: Switzerland offers ideal conditions for gold storage within the framework of DIRECTGOLD: for decades, it has stood for political stability, security and reliability in precious metal custody. An additional advantage is the proximity of the production of the bars at Argor-Heraeus to storage at LOOMIS' high-security warehouse in Switzerland, both within the same country, which keeps transport distances short and security risks to a minimum. Should it become necessary despite Switzerland's high stability, the stored gold can be easily transferred to another international storage location thanks to the global Loomis network.
exkurs.exkursAxedrasTitle: Excursus 5 – The role of aXedras in detail
exkurs.exkursAxedrasParagraph1: aXedras operates a platform for the precious metals industry based on distributed ledger technology (DLT).
exkurs.exkursAxedrasParagraph2: The aim is to build a trustworthy digital ecosystem that connects refineries, dealers, banks, transporters, warehouse operators and investors.
exkurs.exkursAxedrasParagraph3: Each bar is given a unique digital identity with all relevant information: production data, serial number, refinery, transport route, current storage location.
exkurs.exkursAxedrasParagraph4: The aXedras network includes leading global stakeholders in the gold value chain, such as gold mines, leading refineries, the world's largest value logistics companies, warehouse operators, etc.
exkurs.exkursAxedrasParagraph5: aXedras is the technology partner selected by the LBMA and the World Gold Council for the joint Gold Bar Integrity Programme (GBI) and provides the blockchain-based infrastructure through which the authenticity, origin and traceability of LBMA-certified gold bars can be digitally verified. The aim of the Gold Bar Integrity Programme (GBI) is to create a global, tamper-proof digital register for all LBMA-certified gold bars in order to make their authenticity, origin and supply chain transparent and traceable.
exkurs.exkursAxedrasSection1Title: Consequences for DIRECTGOLD customers resulting from aXedras membership:
exkurs.exkursAxedrasSection1Item1: Through GOLDLAGERHAUS Edelmetallverwahrungs AG's direct membership of the exclusive aXedras network, we enable DIRECTGOLD customers to view the data on their bars via the aXedras platform, independently and directly, around the clock.
exkurs.exkursAxedrasSection1Item2: This allows you to check the quality, integrity and location of your bars yourself – independently of dealer or warehouse systems.
exkurs.exkursAxedrasSection1Item3: This creates an unprecedented level of transparency, security and verifiability.

lbmagoldprice.exkurs1: Excursus 1 – The London Bullion Market, the LBMA gold price and the Good Delivery system, allocated and unallocated gold
lbmagoldprice.text1: The London Bullion Market is the world's most important over-the-counter (OTC) wholesale market for physical and unallocated gold and silver. It is coordinated by the London Bullion Market Association (LBMA), which sets the market standards, conditions of participation and requirements for refineries, dealers, storage facilities and clearing members. The London market serves as a global reference point for international gold trading and is supervised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).
lbmagoldprice.text3: The LBMA gold price (AM and PM) is set twice daily on the loco London market for unallocated gold, i.e. for unallocated book positions within the London LBMA clearing system. The auctions are conducted on the fully electronic trading platform operated by Intercontinental Exchange (ICE). The benchmark is administered by ICE Benchmark Administration Limited (IBA), a subsidiary of ICE, on behalf of the LBMA.
lbmagoldprice.text4: Following the discovery of manipulation in the former "gold fixing", the new LBMA gold price was introduced on 20 March 2015, replacing the original fixing that had been in place since September 1919. Auctions take place at 10:30 a.m. (LBMA Gold Price AM) and 3:00 p.m. (LBMA Gold Price PM) London time; pricing is in US dollars, and the IBA also publishes the benchmark in British pounds and euros.
lbmagoldprice.text5: The LBMA Gold Price is now the authoritative global reference for gold transactions – both physical and derivative-based – and serves as the basis for trading, settlement and valuation worldwide. However, it refers exclusively to unallocated gold held in certified LBMA vaults in London.
lbmagoldprice.text7: A "good delivery" gold bar or "standard bar" weighs nominally 400 troy ounces (approx. 12.44 kg), although the actual weight can vary between 350 and 430 troy ounces. The fineness, manufacturer's mark and bar number are stamped on each bar. The bar number uniquely identifies the individual bar and is entered into a central register by the manufacturer. Good Delivery bars may only be produced by LBMA-certified refineries that are listed on the Good Delivery List. These refineries meet strict requirements in terms of quality, production processes, ethical sourcing and traceability. The international "Good Delivery" seal of quality guarantees the authenticity, purity and correct storage of a gold bar. From the day of its manufacture, a Good Delivery bar is stored in vaults recognised and monitored by the LBMA. Every movement is logged, ensuring complete documentation and the integrity of the bars. As a result, buyers accept delivery of a Good Delivery bar directly from the seller's vault without conducting an additional purity test. This system significantly reduces transaction costs and increases the efficiency of precious metal trading. Bars with good delivery status are therefore accepted worldwide and can generally be stored and traded in all certified storage facilities. Good delivery bars are traded as spot gold on the London Bullion Market and settled two business days after the trading day (T+2). All precious metal transactions between clearing members are settled electronically on a net basis by London Precious Metals Clearing Limited (LPMCL). LPMCL is owned and managed by HSBC, ICBC Standard Bank, JP Morgan and UBS. Although settlement takes place in London, it is a global market with participants from all over the world.
lbmagoldprice.text8: When clearing, LPMCL distinguishes between unallocated and allocated precious metal accounts. This distinction is fundamental to understanding international gold trading.
lbmagoldprice.text9: Loco London, unallocated and allocated gold
lbmagoldprice.text11: The customer owns specific, numbered bars and is their legal owner. These bars are physically stored separately from the custodian's assets and are fully protected against insolvency. The holdings are documented in a weight list that shows the bar number, gross weight, fineness and fine weight of each bar. Credits or debits are only made when the bars are actually physically moved. Allocated gold thus represents direct ownership and offers the highest level of protection against counterparty risks or system failures.
lbmagoldprice.text13: Around 95% of global professional gold trading takes place on the basis of unallocated accounts. The customer is only entitled to a certain amount of gold, but not to specific bars. This is a claim against the custodian, similar to a bank deposit, where the account holder is the creditor of the bank. The gold is held in collective holdings and the customer does not own the physical metal. This model is very efficient and liquid, but carries a counterparty risk: if the custodian or bullion house becomes insolvent, the unallocated gold may be lost in part or in full. The system works on the principle of fractional reserve banking, similar to the banking system: only a small proportion of market participants demand physical delivery, which is why banks and bullion houses issue more unallocated credit than they hold physical gold in their vaults. As a result, there are more unallocated claims than there is physical metal actually available. As long as trust remains, the system remains stable; however, a loss of trust or massive demand for delivery can lead to bottlenecks. The customer therefore does not hold ownership, but rather a contractual claim in the form of a debt instrument.
lbmagoldprice.text14: The LBMA Good Delivery Standards define the weight, purity, marking and origin of bars and ensure their global interchangeability. These standards also form the basis for unallocated trading, as physical delivery in OTC trading only takes place when necessary, while accounting is based on standardised, interchangeable bars. The LBMA gold price therefore refers to these standardised good delivery bars located in LBMA-certified storage facilities in London.
lbmagoldprice.text15: Trading volumes, physical stocks loco London and paper-to-physical ratio
lbmagoldprice.text16: LBMA clearing volume: the current average daily net clearing volume is over 20 million troy ounces (~622 tonnes) Source: LBMA Clearing, 2025. OTC/total trading volumes: The World Gold Council estimates average gold trading volumes in 2023 at ~US$163 billion/day (OTC ~US$99 billion, futures ~US$62 billion); In Q3 2025, average daily volumes rose to ~US$388 billion. In addition, ~51% of gold turnover in 2024 was accounted for by the OTC market. Source: LBMA Research, 2025. Physical stocks in London: (as of September 2025) approximately 8,841 tonnes of gold in London LBMA vaults. Source: LBMA Vault Data, 2025 However, a significant portion of the physical stocks are tied up (central banks, ETFs, allocated stocks) – only a fraction is available to cover unallocated trading, and no official figures are published on this.
lbmagoldprice.text17: Estimates of the paper-to-physical ratio – no reliable published figures available: Hardman & Co (Open Letter, January 2020): approx. 5% of paper transfers are physically delivered, the rest remains unallocated Source: Hardman & Co, 2020. BullionStar (2019): estimates of 100:1 to 500:1 (paper to physical) as a critical range Source: BullionStar Blog, 2019. Realistic assessment of coverage: Only part of the physically stored gold is usable, 95% of which is unallocated → ratio of 1:20 to 1:50. In any case, the actual coverage is well below 100%, which highlights the inherent system dependency of unallocated trading.
lbmagoldprice.text18: Over 90% of international gold trading is based on unallocated structures. These enable efficient market liquidity but carry the risk that many claims will encounter a limited physical basis. Those seeking genuine ownership and security should therefore opt for allocated gold – physically existing, clearly assigned metal. DIRECTGOLD therefore deliberately contrasts with the global unallocated market. Every purchase is fully physically backed and legally owned by the customer. The gold is stored in a certified high-security warehouse. Customers thus own real, allocated property in specific numbered gold bars – not a paper claim. Key message: The LBMA gold price creates transparency and comparability. But it is the combination of LBMA price + physical ownership (allocated gold) that guarantees genuine protection, traceability and value retention – the foundation of the DIRECTGOLD principles.

ourProducts.title: PRODUCTS
ourProducts.goldkaufplanDescription: With the DIRECTGOLD gold purchase plan, you regularly and automatically build up your personal gold reserve. You choose a monthly amount that is automatically debited from your account and invested in physical gold. The purchase fee is calculated degressively – the more you invest over time, the cheaper each additional purchase becomes. In addition, you benefit from a special discount: Even planned but not yet executed purchases from your gold purchase plan are taken into account when calculating the purchase fee. This allows you to build up your gold portfolio long-term and cost-effectively without having to worry about each individual purchase.
ourProducts.einzelkaufDescription: With a single purchase, you immediately acquire physical gold in the amount you choose. Each purchase is made at the official LBMA gold price, supplemented by a transparently stated purchase fee. The fee is based on your total investment volume over the last 12 months and decreases with increasing volume. You acquire direct ownership of numbered gold bars assigned to you, which are securely stored in the high-security vault of Loomis in Switzerland. Each bar can be verified by you yourself 24/7 via the aXedras platform – including serial number, origin and current storage location.

services.kaufVerkaufDescription: At DIRECTGOLD, you always buy and sell gold at the official LBMA gold price, supplemented by a transparently stated fee. The purchase fee is degressively tiered and is based on your total investment volume over the last 12 months – the more you invest, the cheaper each additional purchase becomes. For gold purchase plans, even planned future purchases are taken into account. Each transaction is executed at the next possible LBMA gold price PM, and you receive a detailed breakdown of the underlying LBMA price as well as the fee charged. Sales are also made at the LBMA price minus a transparent sales fee. This gives you maximum transparency and competitive conditions without hidden costs.
services.lagerungDescription: Your gold is securely stored in the high-security vault of LOOMIS in Zurich/Kloten, Switzerland. LOOMIS is an LBMA transporter member and part of the official LBMA infrastructure. All stored values are fully insured. You acquire proportional ownership of a collectively stored quantity of registered gold bars between 100 g and 1 kg. As soon as you own at least 100 g, you can register an entire gold bar in your name at any time and have it transferred to you in undivided individual storage exclusively in your name. Each bar can be verified by you yourself 24/7 via the aXedras platform – including serial number, origin and current storage location. Switzerland offers the highest political stability, legal certainty and property protection as a storage location.
services.lieferungDescription: With DIRECT Delivery, you have full control over when and where your physical gold is delivered. You can have your gold delivered to your desired delivery address at any time via our transaction platform – simply, transparently and securely. If your gold is held in collective custody, you decide for yourself in which bar sizes you would like to receive your delivery – from 1 g, 2 g, 5 g, 10 g, 20 g, 1 ounce, 50 g, 100 g, 250 g, 500 g up to 1 kg. If you have your gold bars in individual storage, you can have your specific bars shipped directly from individual storage to your delivery address. All deliveries are carried out by first-class logistics partners and are fully insured. The costs for physical delivery are displayed transparently before you place your order.

securityAndTechnology.title: Security & Technology
securityAndTechnology.paragraph1: DIRECTGOLD combines the world's most advanced verification technology with the highest security standards for your gold. Every bar stored at DIRECTGOLD has a digital twin on the aXedras platform – the forgery-proof, standardized digital representation of the physical gold bar in the "Bullion Integrity Ledger™". Through this blockchain-based technology, you can verify the authenticity, origin, integrity and current storage location of your gold yourself at any time, 24/7, independently and objectively.
securityAndTechnology.paragraph2: The produced bars come directly from LBMA-certified refineries such as Argor-Heraeus and are transported without detours to the high-security vault of LOOMIS in Zurich/Kloten, Switzerland. Switzerland offers the highest political stability, legal certainty and property protection as a storage location – more than 60% of the world's gold is refined and stored here. Through integration into the aXedras network, which was selected by LBMA and World Gold Council as the technology partner of the Gold Bar Integrity Programme, DIRECTGOLD ensures an unprecedented level of transparency, security and verifiability for your gold.
